item.title: My Readling List
item.description: Introduction This is a curated list of reading material and code projects that I enjoy and recommend to others: Reading Coding Architecture Patterns with Python by Harry Percival, Bob Gregory Test-Driven Web Development with Python by Harry Percival Python: Functional programming HOWTO by A. M. Kuchling General tech Stop Emailing Like A Rube - Jeffery Paul Projects General Advent of Code Web HUGO - The world’s fastest framework for building websites Machine learning Explainable AI with Shap - Scott Lundberg Forecasting at scale with Facebook Prophet

item.title: Advent of Code 2021
item.description: About project This is an effort to solve Advent of Code 2021 if I get the time! You will find my code adventure at GitHub Advent of Code 2021 Install I am solving this using mostly python 3.9, but in order to build a proper environment you need to install Poetry and run git clone git@github.com:mortendaehli/advent-of-code-2021.git cd advent-of-code-2021 poetry install Then you can explore each day in each sub-folder under advent_of_code_2021.
